tool.name: IPCA
tool.description: mixOmics package - Independent Principal Component Analysis

param.name: keepX
param.label: How many variables to keep on each dimension
param.help: Separate values with a space or comma

tool.help:
=========== Description ===========
This tool uses the mixOmics R package to perform Independent Principal Component Analysis (IPCA) on the given data matrix, a combination of Principal Component Analysis and Independent Component Analysis.
---------- Usage ----------
input File (X) a tabular file which provides the data for the IPCA analysis, it can contain missing values.
Number of components if the data is complete, this parameter decides the number of components ...
